div.p: Translation: from P.Oxy. 3 Philiscus and Herodes, keepers of the public records, to Chaeremon and Papontos, sitologi of the Monimus district, and Heraclides, sitologus of the Sink... district, and Dionysius, ex-sitologus of the M... district, greeting. There has been registered with us through the scribe Apollonius on Phamenoth 30 of the 18th year of Hadrianus Caesar the lord the detailed list for each sitologus-district of the supplementary payments of wheat-produce for the 17th year, and by Chaeremon and Papontos for the Monimus district and by Heraclides for the Sink... district the monthly summary for Mecheir, and by Chaeremon and Papontos only for the Monimus district both the monthly summary for Phamenoth and the secondary detailed list of receipts. Signed by me, Theon, scribe.
